pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video presents a serene, snowy landscape. The scene features a vast, snow-covered field with several buildings, including red houses and white yurts, in the distance. A dark, forested hill lines the horizon under a grey, overcast sky as snow gently falls. The camera performs a slow pan and zoom, but there is no other significant subject motion.
